remarks: Alternate version of ~ usgedgleord with a shorter proof.  In a graph, the number of edges which contain a given vertex is not greater than the order of the graph, i. e. the number of its vertices, analogous to ~ usgraedgleord .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Jan-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 12-Jan-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
usgedgleordALT.v $e |- V = ( 1st ` G ) $.
usgedgleordALT.e $e |- E = ( Edges ` G ) $.
usgedgleordALT.o $e |- O = ( # ` V ) $.
usgedgleordALT $p |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ N e. V ) -> ( # ` { e e. E | N e. e } ) <_ O ) $.
$d E e $.
$d N e $.
